alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 10:09PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Light Snow and Gusty Winds Starting Wednesday Night... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to possibly moderate snow. Accumulations of 1 to 2 inches, with 2 to 4 inches on Casper Mountain. North to northeast wind gusting 25 to 30 mph will lead to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Portions of Natrona County, including Casper Mountain. * WHEN...10 PM Wednesday to 12 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on roadways will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times Wednesday night into Thursday morning. Blowing and drifting snow will occur. This includes Interstate 25 and US Highway 20/26 from Casper to Hiland.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
